metadata.name: Blessing Altars
metadata.description:
[h1]Receive the blessings of the gods[/h1]
[b]5 new altars to help through your journey ![/b]
[i]Compatible with [ulr=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Config Mod Menu[/url][/i] This mod adds 5 altars that will grant you bonuses. They randomly appear at the end of a cleared room and can be activated with 5 coins. The default spawnrate setting are configurable with Config Mod Menu. The default value are: [list] [*]1 in 6 chance during the 2 first stages [*]1 in 4 chance after [/list]
[u]This section describe the different altars:[/u] [list] [*]Ability Altar : Add a chance to fire an additional other tear [spoiler]Formula :1 in (1,21 - AbilityStack); Max Stack :20[/spoiler] [*]Tenacity Altar : Add a chance to negate a damage taken [spoiler]Formula :TenacityStack%; Max Stack :20[/spoiler] [*]Speed Altar : Add speed [spoiler]Formula :+0.05* SpeedStack; Max Stack :10[/spoiler] [*]Luck Altar : Add luck [spoiler]Formula :+0.5* LuckStack; MaxStack :8[/spoiler] [*]Damage Altar : Add damage [spoiler]Formula :+1/3 * DamageStack; MaxStack :12[/spoiler] [/list]
